articles.title: PNC Financial Hits a New 52-Week High: How to Approach the Stock?
articles.mainIdea: PNC Financial Hits a New 52-Week High: How to Approach the Stock?
articles.summary: Zacks: PNC Financial Hits a New 52-Week High: How to Approach the Stock?. PNC touches a new 52-week high. Does the stock have more upside as strong Q3 U.S. economic growth and optimism around the FirstBank deal lift investor confidence? Related tickers mentioned: BAC, C.

articles.title: Coinbase vs. CME Group: Which Exchange Platform is Faring Better?
articles.mainIdea: Coinbase vs. CME Group: Which Exchange Platform is Faring Better?
articles.summary: Zacks: Coinbase vs. CME Group: Which Exchange Platform is Faring Better?. COIN and CME both target growth, but only one is gaining ground as they expand beyond trading into new digital frontiers. Related tickers mentioned: CME, COIN.

articles.title: BlackRock Ramps Up Hiring, Eyes Next Phase of Crypto Expansion
articles.mainIdea: BlackRock Ramps Up Hiring, Eyes Next Phase of Crypto Expansion
articles.summary: Zacks: BlackRock Ramps Up Hiring, Eyes Next Phase of Crypto Expansion. BLK ramps up senior hiring in New York and Singapore to drive crypto, stablecoins and tokenization after its Bitcoin ETF success. Related tickers mentioned: BAC, BLK, BTC-USD, ETH-USD, IBIT.
